{"id":648674273,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1645796214,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"26 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/648674273/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Toeplitz Matrix","memory":"17.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool ist(vector<vector<int>>& mat,int x,int y){\n        int m = mat.size();\n        int n = mat[0].size();\n        int t = mat[x][y];\n        while(x<m && y<n){\n            if(mat[x][y]!=t){\n                return false;\n            }\n            else{\n                x++;\n                y++;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n    bool isToeplitzMatrix(vector<vector<int>>& mat) {\n        for(int i=0;i<mat[0].size();i++){\n            if(ist(mat,0,i)==false){\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n        for(int i=0;i<mat.size();i++){\n            if(ist(mat,i,0)==false){\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"toeplitz-matrix"}
